noun.description: A wrestling maneuver in which an opponent is swiftly brought to the mat from a standing position.
The removal of a website, web page, or file from the Internet, typically in response to a formal request.
examples: a copyright takedown notice can result in your channel getting deleted

noun.description: Denoting a firearm with the capacity to have the barrel and magazine detached from the stock.
An instance of overwhelmingly defeating or severely criticizing someone or something.
examples: a takedown of the self-help movement
a vicious takedown of celebrities who are famous for being famous
